==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|とう|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょうとう}} compound {{m|zh|小刀|tr=sjew<sup>X</sup> taw|lit=small + blade}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading '' xiǎodāo'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''siu<sup>2</sup> dou<sup>1</sup>'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''sió-to''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|しょうとう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょうとう|hhira=せうたう}}

# small [[knife]], [[short sword]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|こ|かたな|k2=がたな}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=こがたな|小|tr1=ko|t1=small, little|刀|tr2=katana|t2=sword, blade}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=こがたな|katana|gatana}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|こがたな|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5|acc2=2|acc2_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こがたな}}

# small [[knife]], [[short sword]]
